title: Smart Data Models - Participant Agent Service
description: A data model for a Participant Agent (Connector) tool. This tool can implement multiple services like Credential Store, Contract Negotiation, Transfer Process, and Data Plane. It extends the base ToolInformation model.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be ParticipantAgent.

credentialStore.description: Property. Details of the credential store capabilities.

contractNegotiation.description: Property. Details of the contract negotiation capabilities.

transferProcess.description: Property. Details of the transfer process capabilities.

dataPlane.description: Property. Details of the data plane capabilities, defining one or more data exchange APIs.

accepts.description: Property. List of MIME types the data plane can accept for import. Corresponds to HTTP Accept header.

contentType.description: Property. List of MIME types the data plane can export. Corresponds to HTTP Content-Type header.

openAPI.description: Property. Link(s) to a machine-readable interface of the API. Corresponds to tcat:openAPI.

name.description: Property. Name of the specification or standard. Corresponds to dc:title.

standardizedBy.description: Property. The standardization body. Corresponds to tcat:standardizedBy.

conformsTo.description: Property. Version(s) of the specification it conforms to. Corresponds to dcterms:conformsTo.

homepage.description: Property. Homepage of the specification. Corresponds to foaf:homepage.
